epic.title: Minimal Fashion E-Store
epic.summary: Deliver a minimal, user-friendly ASP.NET fashion store with catalog browsing, secure checkout, and admin management.

features.title: Homepage Shell
features.description: Layout pieces for the home screen: header, nav, sidebar and footer.

stories.title: Header with role indicator
stories.description: Implement header with logo and a visible role indicator.
acceptance_criteria: Logo renders and links to Home
Role indicator displays 'Visitor' when not logged in and username when logged in
Header passes basic accessibility checks

stories.title: Build sidebar links
stories.description: Build sidebar/quick-links module for Clothing and Order Us navigation.
acceptance_criteria: Sidebar contains links to Clothing and Order Us
Links are keyboard accessible
Sidebar collapses on smaller screens
stories.raw_text_reference: Clothing Order Us Contact Us About Us Track

stories.title: Add footer
stories.description: Implement footer with copyright and contact link.
acceptance_criteria: Footer shows copyright line
Contact link navigates to Contact Us page
Footer layout matches responsive spec

features.title: Product Details
features.description: Detailed product view and metadata presentation on Clothing Page.

stories.title: Product detail component
stories.description: Create product detail component showing description and image.
acceptance_criteria: Detail view shows image, description and price
User can open detail from product grid
Image zoom or modal available
stories.raw_text_reference: Add an extra dose of style as you adorn this slim-fit T-shirt

stories.title: Order button
stories.description: Implement 'Order this Product' button linking to order flow with product ID.
acceptance_criteria: Button navigates to order flow with correct product ID
Product ID included in order payload
Button disabled if out of stock

stories.title: Show price label
stories.description: Display price and category next to product title.
acceptance_criteria: Price displayed in correct currency
Category label visible and clickable to filter by category
Formatting consistent across site

features.title: Checkout UX
features.description: Cart, order summary and redirection to payment.

stories.title: Order summary page
stories.description: Implement order summary page listing products, quantities and line totals.
acceptance_criteria: Summary lists item name, qty, unit price and line total
Grand total includes taxes and delivery if applicable
Summary page allows navigation back to edit cart
stories.raw_text_reference: Once users order item they are able to see ordered products and grand total.

stories.title: Create order record
stories.description: Wire checkout submit to create order record in Orders table.
acceptance_criteria: Submission creates order row with required fields
Server returns order ID on success
System handles duplicate submissions idempotently
stories.raw_text_reference: Orders: ID, Client, Product, Quantity, Price, Date, OrderShipped

stories.title: Add client validation
stories.description: Add client-side validation for quantity and required fields before submission.
acceptance_criteria: Invalid quantities block submission
Required fields flagged with inline error messages
Validation works on mobile and desktop
stories.raw_text_reference: Only registered member can purchase multiple products regardless of quantity.

stories.title: Redirect to PayPal
stories.description: Redirect to PayPal with itemized order summary for Instant Pay.
acceptance_criteria: PayPal receives itemized payload and displays correct totals
User returned to success or failure URL after payment
Order status updates according to PayPal callback

stories.title: Success page and mail
stories.description: Implement success page showing order details and send mail confirmation.
acceptance_criteria: Success page displays order ID and summary
Customer receives order details via email
Success page only accessible after valid payment callback
stories.raw_text_reference: Congratulations! Transaction completed successfully. You receive you order details in your mail

stories.title: Failure page
stories.description: Implement failure page with retry instructions and contact link.
acceptance_criteria: Failure page explains reason and provides retry button
Contact link goes to Contact Us page
Failure attempts logged for troubleshooting
definition_of_ready: Failure messages mapped to error codes
stories.raw_text_reference: :( Sorry! Transaction Failed. Please order again!

features.title: Admin Ops
features.description: Admin tools for managing products, users and shipping state.

stories.title: Admin product form
stories.description: Create DB-backed admin form to add and edit shopping table entries.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can create/edit shopping table fields (ID, Product, Product ID, Cost, Category, Image, Description)
Saved changes reflect in public catalog
Form validates required fields
stories.raw_text_reference: Shopping: ID, Product, Product ID, Cost, Category, Image, Description

stories.title: Mark shipped
stories.description: Implement order list with ability to mark OrderShipped and record Date.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can set OrderShipped and record ship date per order
Order status updates visible in admin and user views
Ship action triggers confirmation email

stories.title: Enforce admin access
stories.description: Enforce admin-only access for admin pages and actions.
acceptance_criteria: Non-admin users cannot access admin routes
Unauthorized attempts return 403 or redirect
Admin UI hidden for non-admin sessions
stories.raw_text_reference: Administrator can only perform administrative task on pages they are privileged to access.
